metadata.title: CVE-2020-6826 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Mozilla developers Tyson Smith, Bob Clary, and Alexandru Michis reportedmemory safety bugs present in Firefox 74. Some of these bugs showedevidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effort someof these could have been exploited to run arbitrary code. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 75.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-6826` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 75.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-geckodriver - 75.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 75.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '75.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
